title: Most preferred sources of entertainment in India in 2011
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Using the internet for social or personal interests has the highest Share of respondents and Listening to the radio (any format/device) has the lowest Share of respondents.
Response Using the internet for social or personal interests has 4.25 times more Share of respondents than Response Listening to the radio (any format/device) which is has the lowest.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Using the internet for social or personal interests has the highest Share of respondents and Listening to the radio (any format/device) has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Response Using the internet for social or personal interests has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Listening to the radio (any format/device).
Share of respondents at Response Using the internet for social or personal interests is 51.0 , second place is  at 51.0, and thirdly is Reading newspapers (either printed or online) at 46.0.
Similar Share of respondents is found in Response Using the internet for social or personal interests, and Watching television (any device).
The Response Listening to the radio (any format/device) tends to be 1.6 percent lower than average.
The Share of respondents is 287.0 if we add up values of all Responses.

data.Response: Using the internet for social or personal interests
Reading books (either physical books or via an e-book reader/online)
Playing videogames (handhelds PC console mobile/cellular/smartphone online)
